document.full_text: lebron james took the opening step toward winning his first championship by leading the miami heat to a 92-84 victory over the dallas mavericks in game one of the nba finals on tuesday.
document.title: james helps heat burn bright in finals opener
lines_and_colors: lebron james took the opening step toward winning his first championship by leading the miami heat to a 92-84 victory over the dallas mavericks in game one of the nba finals on tuesday.
